sdef erg=d6
     par=1 $pure neutron source
     pos= 50 6.5 0
     x=50
     y=d1
     z=d2
     vec=-1 0 0
     dir=1
si1 4.25 7
sp1    0.   1.
si2 -1.0 1.0
sp2    0.   1.
si6 h   1.00e-10            $// Energy-Bins Neutron

        1.00E+01
